publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2358 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment Order 2005—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-2358 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment Order 2005—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2004 Amendment Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott
